derivation: or (more correctly) אֲבִיחַיִל ; from H1 (אָב) and H2428 (חַיִל); father (i.e. possessor) of might;
outline:
Abihail = "my father is might"
  1. a Levite in Moses's time
  2. a Gadite
  3. father of Esther
  4. wife of Abishur
  5. wife of Rehoboam
strongs_def: Abihail or Abichail, the name of three Israelites and two Israelitesses
